data.eml:eml: Species of Horismenus Walker (Hymenoptera: Eulophidae) associated with bruchid beetles (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Bruchinae), including five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hansson, Christer, Kenyon, Sarah G., Benrey, Betty (2019): Species of Horismenus Walker (Hymenoptera: Eulophidae) associated with bruchid beetles (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Bruchinae), including five new species. Zootaxa 4585 (1): 168-188, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4585.1.10
